scripts.makesecret:
printf  'repo: gcp-fn-template
secrets:
  YOUR_ZENDESK_URL: hello
  YOUR_ZENDESK_EMAIL: hello
  YOUR_ZENDESK_API_TOKEN: hello
  SUMOENDPOINT: hello
  ACCESSTOKEN: hello' > secrets.yaml
scripts.makestart:
printf '' > start.sh
printf 'env ' >> start.sh
cat secrets.yaml | shyaml get-value secrets | sed -e 's/:[^://]/="/g;s/$/"/g;s/ *=/=/g'| tr -s '
' ' ' >> start.sh
printf ' nodemon --exec npm start'>>start.sh
